column10: my wife went through the crosswalk but a car sped through cutting me off, if I had not seen the car and followed  her through would have been hit, close call all around, car appeared to be yielding but sped through
Pedestrian failed to yield to a car too close to crosswalk to stop safely before stepping of curb

Driver purposely drove too close and yelled as we attempted to cross N Harrison.  We were traveling S on Harrison and multiple poles and sign posts prevented our stroller from fitting on the sidewalk so we had to go around in the street.
